Result$: show him respect, so we don't look suspicious!$
SubNote$: The "~" sign tells the game that you are using "templar" as a keyword in your emote, and don't just want to output the text "bows to templar".  When you use the keyword, the templar will see: "the tall, muscular man bows to you".  Everyone else will see "the tall, muscular man bows to the willowy, grey-streaked templar".  Take a look at the links for more info on how emotes work.  They are a big part of this game!$
